New Records: Matt Wallner homered for the second straight game
Brooks Lee broke an 0-for-19 streak with a go-ahead, two-run double
Royce Lewis nearly had his sixth career grand slam
Key Match Events: Brooks Lee's go-ahead, two-run double in the seventh inning
Royce Lewis' drive initially called a home run but corrected to a double
Post-Match Reflections: Matt Wallner expressed pride in the team's performance
Rocco Baldelli highlighted the team's offensive efforts
Nolan Schanuel and Jordyn Adams shared their thoughts on the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Minnesota Twins' position in the AL Central standings
Brandon Drury left the game with left hamstring tightness
Bryce Teodosio suffered a small finger fracture
Others: Game was played at Target Field in Minneapolis
Umpires included Hunter Wendelstedt, Charlie Ramos, John Tumpane, and Marvin Hudson
